sentence.Network_en: Chapter Two explores the dialogism in the Light in August.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二章致力于阐释《八月之光》的对话性.

sentence.Network_en: The third chapter studies on the aesthetical discourse theory of the dialogism aesthetics.
sentence.Network_cn: 第三章讨论对话美学的审美语言理论.

sentence.Network_en: Firstly, the varied narrative voices in the novel contradict with each other and constitute dialogism accordingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 首先, 小说采用多个叙述者从不同的视角下发出多种叙述声音,这些叙述声音相互补充、对立,从而形成一种对话.
